website_summaries.verdict: Extremely low price point versus most plantar fasciitis splints. Owners say it works well, but it is bulky.
pros: Soft padding makes it comfortable to wear on either foot
Customers see benefits from wearing it within a few days
A good value for those wanting to try a splint for the first time
cons: Some owners report the Velcro straps aren't long enough
Buckles may dig into skin and cause pain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my achilles tendonitis! Beats the $200 brace my ortho sold me!
customer_reviews.text: I have achilles tendonitis, and my orthopedist put me in a splint. The one from his office was too tall! It was causing me to have the worst calf cramps. A friend is a physical therapist and she recommended this one. It beats the $200 one from my ortho!!! So much more comfy, so much lighter. I did have to take the "foot ramp" out of the front to hold my foot in the alignment my doc wanted, but it's easy to do. It's just velcro'd in, so yank it out and you're good to go! This is lighter, cooler and so much more comfortable. But, it holds my foot right where it's supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: J. BurnettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: These helped my plantar fasciitis heal pretty quick. Had it bad in both feet. Wearing them only at night while sleeping and in five days I was almost pain free. Make sure you don't tighten the straps too much or you will get a different kind of pain or spasm. Had to ding a star because one of mine was missing parts and took some effort to get it resolved. But the company eventually came through and made it right!
customer_reviews.author: Eliott Ness

customer_reviews.title: All good now.  WAS Missing wedge and ball!
customer_reviews.text: New review: So I recieved everything with my splint this time! It works as described, good if you don't plan on walking much. I was grabbing a few beers through the night and noticed the foot inster was shifting to the side. Clipping clips aren't as bad as other buyers were saying, for my anyway. Old Review : Got it in, and it was missing the ball and wedges. I returned it today and I'm going to re-order it again. I'll update this review once the next one arrives
customer_reviews.author: Johnny from TX

customer_reviews.title: What is the point?
customer_reviews.text: When you are sitting or standing, this works. But the point is to wear it to sleep. When you lay down, the wedge forcing the foot up no longer has the same resistance and the foot loses the pressure against the wedge which causes the stretch. If you tighten the straps, as I did, you can create pressure again but...as cost of your circulation and the straps cut into the skin. So, you can have pressure...and a BLUE foot or no pressure...and the same issue as before you bought the boot.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me at all
customer_reviews.text: I can't picture this working for anybody but many other reviewers disagree with me so, go figure. My foot went numb within an hour or so of wearing it. If I loosen the straps then I get no slight bend back of the foot which in my view defeats the purpose of wearing one of these contraptions. I gave it 3 stars because it is well built and others say it works for them so I felt a little guilty... lol
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Portela

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems Good
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems to be good; I haven't had it long enough to know if it will hold up. The comfort is good; I have not yet received relief from my pain - but it's only been a little over a week. My biggest reason for not giving a higher rating is that there were NO DIRECTIONS. How long and often should I use the spiked ball? When should I expect relief?
customer_reviews.author: Dana Heintze

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with Plantar's Fasciitis for quite sometime until I started using this splint. It is simple and just works. What I like is there is no pressure on the metatarsals. It is a little cumbersome to reach the buckles but the buckles is what makes this splint so good. I had another splint that had velcro and during the night that would come undone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Has helped so much.
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I need them for which is my planter fasciitis. I just wish there was a more compact way for me to get pain relief when I sleep. And I wish that they had a left and a right snaps for the braces. Catchy and they could’ve done a better job on the Velcro placement on the straps. I had to buy my own Velcro to adjust for myself I have smaller legs probably the most people.
customer_reviews.author: Shemaah

customer_reviews.title: keeping your feeet at right angles.
customer_reviews.text: These are not as uncomfortable as they look. They are soft and the padding is forgiving. I don't have trouble with the straps or how they fit... however, I do find that I can't wear them all night. I wake up frequently and end up taking them off. This tends to be because my feet ache or because my calf is seizing up. This may just not be the correct solution to my particular problem. I am keeping them, however, because I believe they do help stretch out my feet somewhat. I just have to limit the time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Crookes

customer_reviews.title: Just didnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high arch and instep. Fitting this boot is easy and feels great when you are standing in it. When you lay down the straps need to be extremely tight to keep your foot at the appropriate angle. This caused a great deal of discomfort and lack of sleep. There may be a trick to adjusting it to your foot, but I do not know it and it was not included in any kind of documentation. I will say this appears to be a very well built device. I would use it to walk around the house during the day but not as a night spling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really helped!
customer_reviews.text: I am a basketball official and have had Achilles issues for a number of years. I have a brace which does help, but the problem always gets worse when working many nights in a row. I just got this last week and thus for it has really helped. I am not able to wear it a full night when sleeping being it gets uncomfortable for me...maybe in time. After having it on for about a hour and a half and then taking it off I can feel how much more loose and pain free my Achilles are walking. It was an instant difference! For a low cost this worked for me and I would suggest trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this aid in my plantar fasciitis recovery. To be fair in my review I have only had it for about 3 1/2 weeks. It is easy to use and adjust. It is hard to sleep with but, I expected that. To put a more positive spin on this, I do feel a little better in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and pretty self explanatory
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be helping, immediately noticed significantly less pain in the morning when waking up. Easy to put on and pretty self explanatory. Sole has a nice cushy foam. Bottom is hard but I have no issues walking if I need to go to the restroom at night. I wonder if also wearing it during the day would increase the effectiveness?
customer_reviews.author: RN22lr

customer_reviews.title: Product that i will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I will be in a brace off and on for the rest of my life.Boot was shipped quick,but the sewing on the pading came loose after the first week ,which caused rubbing on my leg.
customer_reviews.author: THE B's

customer_reviews.title: helps with the pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Plantar fasiitus and after just wearing it to bed a couple nights it helped the pain a tremendous amount. It is pretty light weight, sturdy and fits on even a large foot. It has kept me from having to get injections in my foot at least for now. I have recommended this product to several people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing relief!
customer_reviews.text: I got this splint yesterday, wore it overnight, and had the least pain in my foot than I've had for almost year. I spent $800 on orthotics, got two different steroid injections (neither worked), and exercised my foot several times a day to no avail. Who would've thought that the cheapest solution (other than exercising) would turn out to be the one that provided the best solution? I can't even express how grateful I am for this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive instructions for device. Packaging was horrible! It said to save for return, there would be no way to return this item. Velcro straps do not stay on very well. I feel like I am adjusting things quite often and I just started using this. I had high hopes this would work, I will keep the high hopes it works. I don't want my review to stop others from using this product. This is just the experience that I have gone through.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Guy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this splint is that you need to tighten the straps pretty tight on your ankle and foot in order to keep your foot at the correct 90 degree angle. When the straps are that tight, it hurts my foot and I wake up in the middle of the night and want nothing more than to take it off. I plan to use something else because my plantar fasciitis has become worse since wearing this brace
customer_reviews.author: Calyn

customer_reviews.title: Left and right fit
customer_reviews.text: How do I get the option to order for the right foot, I received a left and it is very difficult to strap. The boot came with an “L” sticker on it. The product works very well and the first steps in the morning hurts no longer
customer_reviews.author: Larry Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Working for a while
customer_reviews.text: This was working well for a while, until it started giving me rashes. I remove the lining and put it to the laundry, but the process of doing that remove the adhesive from the velcro attachments, so I can't get the lining back on
customer_reviews.author: alaron

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: My doctor told me to get this splint or one similar at least. Seems to be doing its job however in my sleep there's a pinching on the side of my foot. Gotta figure out how to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Brikbrat03

customer_reviews.title: After first night, instant relief.
customer_reviews.text: My heel had been in pain for a week, I dreaded getting out of bed from the pain. The very next morning after sleeping in the splint my foot pain was noticeably less. I've slept with it for almost a week now and my pain is less each day. Glad I purchased the splint , well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: john rich

customer_reviews.title: Night Splint
customer_reviews.text: Night Splint is great! Only thing is it is a little bulky to sleep in. What i do is sleep with my foot out from under the covers and use a seperate cover/blanket for that foot. But it does stretch the Fascia as it is suppose to. Anything to help relieve any discomfort. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price that seems to match other comparable products
customer_reviews.text: Great price that seems to match other comparable products. The adjustment lower segment area could be set closer to the toes to prevent side to side slippage. Other than that, very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sand

customer_reviews.title: A winner in the splint department!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different splint from the same company but it just didn't work for me. This one is great and I'm wearing it as much as possible. I tried sleeping with it on, but only lasted a few hours. Still this splint design makes sense - so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Works;  Foot went numb
customer_reviews.text: I liked it and it helped my foot pain. But when I slept in it, I woke with my foot numb. It took a few days for my foot to feel normal again. I would not sleep with it again. I would just use it while I am sitting, etc. I have a different one with more cushioning that I can sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Penn Name

customer_reviews.title: Large, clunky, cumbersome, uncomfortable and not easy to put on...aside from that it did help a bit
customer_reviews.text: The boot does work to some degree, but the design is cumbersome. It is not easy to put on and adjust. It is not comfortable - could only wear it for a couple of hours at a time. Quit using it after the fourth time. I would not recommend. Has to be better options out there. 2 stars because it did help some.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I had no idea that such a simple brace could make such a difference. Having tried every heel cup and compression product for the last few years, I would wake up and still spend a good 30 minutes trying to stretch out my plantar muscle and be able to walk normally again. Since using this brace, no pain upon waking up. Only reservation is that it's kind of bulky and uncomfortable for a restless sleeper, but I'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: I worry this twice. had to take it off both times because of the pain that the straps were causing. actually injured my foot wearing it. waste of $.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia E. Lott

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the one I got from my doctor. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, quality boot!
customer_reviews.text: I had a difficult time with plantar fasciitis for 3 months prior to using this night splint. The first night after using this I had minimal pain getting out of bed! This is not a miracle cure but has given me a lot more relief than any of the other measures I've tried. These boots are fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: 8. 5 size should be medium. The velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: 8.5 size should be medium. The velcro is a little too long for small feet. It is hard to wear it in bed, and you get numb after a while. However, it works. I am on the road to recovery of my PF.
customer_reviews.author: p582938

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product Amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I have been paralyzed for almost 5 years now and over the last year have had significant problems requiring surgeries on my feet. Because of the bandaging I developed drop foot and can no longer wear shoes. These boots work. I can feel the tendons stretching and its amazing. They do seem to run a little big and there are really directions on where the straps should go exactly and how tight they should be but its not hard to kinda figure it out yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Ewers

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked this splint better than the one I got from ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked this splint better than the one I got from my ortho doctor and it cost about 90% less than the one I bought from him. I just reviewed an Amazon product and mentioned my ortho doctor. Staring 40 in the eye is getting more glamorous by the day.
customer_reviews.author: ChBrink

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to finally be right about something
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and then explained to my podiatrist that I an using this particular splint. She said that this is the one she always recommends to her patients with a plantar problem. It's nice to finally be right about something.
customer_reviews.author: John Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the boot for two weeks and I am very satisfied. I use it at night wake up in the morning with no pain. It is also easy to put it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Pvelasco

customer_reviews.title: Great relief from pain
customer_reviews.text: Hubby notices huge improvement...his podiatrist recommended this splint, although initially it took a few nights to get used to it he definitely sees a huge improvement from pain when he wears it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana  Nora

customer_reviews.title: Surgery patient...
customer_reviews.text: Just had plantar fasciitis relief surgery. These braces are perfect for keeping my feet stretched out during the day and night. Much cooler than my walking boot. I love how easy it is to put on and take off. Set the straps once and forget about them. Awesome product and an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley E Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This splint has made a huge difference. For the first time in months, I can put weight on my foot without stabbing pain upon getting out of bed. This is after using it for just a couple nights! I wish I had known about this months ago. It is definitely not made for walking; however, a careful trip to the bathroom is possible. The device is very light and well padded. If you have plantar fasciitis, I cannot recommend this highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty123

customer_reviews.title: How it fits and feels
customer_reviews.text: Fits snuggly on my lower leg and foot. I found it easy to adjust and also easy to walk in. My plantar fasciitis feels much better after time in the splint. It does seem to pull my big toe up, but that's part of stretching the plantar fasciitis. I have not slept in the boot yet, but am working up to 8 hours at a time before trying.
customer_reviews.author: J Helton

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these boots. I found it to be reasonably comfortable. I do think they should have a left and a right as i tried it on my right foot and it is a little difficult with the straps on the outside of my foot. Easy to put on the left foot. I am getting ready to order a second because after only 3 nights I can feel a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This could be a great splint since the “boot” is much slimmer and compact ...
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great splint since the “boot” is much slimmer and compact than most other splints out there, but the straps are way too long and don’t have enough Velcro to secure your foot properly. I don’t have skinny feet or legs, but I was still unable to get a good fit because the straps were just too long. I ended up wrapping the strap around itself to try and get a secure fit, but it would loosen every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temporarily relieves foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Temporarily relieves foot pain for my Plantar Fascaitis (spelling) but it makes my foot uncomfortable while in the boot if I leave it on for too long. For me, it is difficult to sleep in, however it does help keep my foot straight and it helps with the pain in the morning
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended. Been using it for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Been using it for a week now. My PT thought it might help with stretching my ankle area at night because I have been having trouble after ankle replacement last December. One of the Velcro straps is not closed completely but I have been able to work around it.
customer_reviews.author: DW Hays

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on/take off
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy to put on/take off. Makes my foot feel better when worn. Doesn't compress the toes like those socks for PF. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Keane

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I did my research. I decided to give it a try. I felt relief after the first night. I wore it consistently for about a month. I continued to exercise and stretch my foot before and after. My pain is gone. I travel frequently for work and I was able to fit this in my carry-on suitcase without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MommyT

customer_reviews.title: Don't think this helps
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in the night splint and it's very hard for me to use this pass a few hours. Your foot never stays positioned correctly inside the splint. So unless I wrap my food with an ace bandage it will not stay flexed. The whole point of the splint is to flex your foot so that the Achilles' tendon will relax, but when you relax your leg for foot.. the muscle dorsi flex down and then puts pressure onto the big toe and palm of foot. I the middle of the night my toes go numb and I remove the splint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot Pain
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my foot pain a lot. I am glad that I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, good price
customer_reviews.text: This splint is working as intended. Keeps my foot in the flexed position in order to avoid pain when I stand. It’s fairly comfortable, as far as splints go. I’ve had to keep adjusting, but that’s a user issue.
customer_reviews.author: Running Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I'd purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Immediate relief from discomfort. It's a little bulky but I can live with that!
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Hosey

customer_reviews.title: I love this splint
customer_reviews.text: I love this splint. I had a tibia/ fibula fracture with a fractured ankle also. It keeps my ankle stabilize while I sleep. I also use it to replace my walker cam while at home since it is so light weight. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia H

customer_reviews.title: Works but hard to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: Helps with pain. Hard to sleep in. Wish it came with some instructions on how to use/combine the wedges for correct support
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Great brace.. really helps not having pain in the morning.! Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moore

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: I chose this after looking at reviews for it and competing splints. I used something similar, but very padded, many years ago. I have used this now for a month. It does its job well, and I think it is less cumbersome in bed than padded versions. For me, it has negligible impact on sleeping. I am able to put it on with no light. I do not walk on it, because of concerns regarding breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toes up great product 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have been dealing with muscle cramps due to my dropped foot. I wish I had found this sooner had lots of sleepless nights before it.
customer_reviews.author: PeterB

customer_reviews.title: I didn't use it, but the quality seemed about a 4. Stable, but not the best. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use it, but the quality seemed about a 4. Stable, but not the best. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jorri Carter

customer_reviews.title: some silly design choices. Velcro doesn't extend enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: some silly design choices. Velcro doesn't extend enough to truly tighten to fit as desired. Also no options to further raise the angle of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: danlfl

customer_reviews.title: I suffered with Achilles tendinitis in both feet for over ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffered with Achilles tendinitis in both feet for over a year. I had physical therapy, wore a boot, and was told I would have to be non-weight bearing for 6-8 weeks at least to see improvement. These were suggested by my FNP and I was out of constant pain within days!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made. Delivered promptly. It is a little more bulky than others. But if you sleep through the night, it is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The materials in this night splint were acceptable but the straps weren't adjustable enough. The device was"as advertised" but isn't comfortable enough to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the quality was horrible, the velcro straps broke the first night I ...
customer_reviews.text: The price was exceptional, the shipping was lightning mcqueen fast, but the quality was horrible, the velcro straps broke the first night I used it. It was comfortable nice thick padding ran a little small, not true to size, have to go all out of my way just to try to return it, instead of shipping papers being sent with package just in case it needs to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I cannot wear it through a full ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I cannot wear it through a full night. keeps me awake. But I do try to wear it when ever possible. I does help with the morning pain.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter27

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Doctor to work!
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to get used to but helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: It helped me
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of weeks. I haven't been able to wear it all night. At first, I wore it for 30 minutes and every evening I would extend the time. I now wear it for a couple of hours and it really helps my foot.
customer_reviews.author: wendy from the midwest

customer_reviews.title: Defective cushions for foot straps
customer_reviews.text: The cushion for one of the foot straps is defective. Apparently it was not properly stitched. I will be satisfied if you will send a couple ofreplacement cushions for the foot straps.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my plantar fasciitis. The Velcro get in ...
customer_reviews.text: Really helps my plantar fasciitis. The Velcro get in the way sometimes when putting on but it really helps a lot. Its cushion as well. I sleep all night with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Best for achilles tendonitis
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my achilles tendonitis. Tried different types of products but I found relief after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amol V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped a lot with my foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally the pain is going away!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something I can actually sleep in that doesn't make me feel so bound up. The best part is that I can take those first few steps in the morning and they don't hurt near as bad. Seems my feet are healing now. Thank you for a well thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: SMeadows

customer_reviews.title: I can tell a major difference in my pain level ...
customer_reviews.text: I can tell a major difference in my pain level since my doctor recommenced this product. I wish I had order a day boot. But my condition is improving since I have been sleeping in the night splint. I even cancelled my follow up doctors appointment. I don't suggest that for anyone else but I don't feel the need to go back and pay for another doctor visit.
customer_reviews.author: sherrell harris

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Stopped the pain.
customer_reviews.text: This splint worked very quickly to eliminate the pain I was having.
customer_reviews.author: Candace A. Owen

customer_reviews.title: helps but not comfortable to walk around with
customer_reviews.text: ok product but not comfortable to walk with. I usually put it on once i am in bed. even walking to bathroom and back, i have to take it off, otherwise very hard to walk with.
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Easy to put on and felt good immediately. Fast service and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher905

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well my heel does not fit down ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit well my heel does not fit down so I lose the flexion needed. Other then that it is well designed
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Tore my bed sheet and needs right/ left options.
customer_reviews.text: This brace did a great job holding my foot securely. Can remove the foam wedge under the toes if the lift is too much starting out. I preferred wearing a fluffy slipper sock with it to protect from the straps. But I have 2 big complaints. It needs to come in left and right options #1 because the buckles are difficult when used on the right foot and # the inside ball of my foot rubs on the edge because it is not contoured for right/ left. My second complaint - after just 4 nights I discovered a big rip in my 3 year old fitted bed sheet from this thing rubbing and wearing through. Not amused.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used for my son left legs almost everyday for good support from the surgery. MT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good quality, and is totally helping my plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product does what it needs but I don't think it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it needs but I don't think it is going to last. Seams on sewn parts are already separating. Velcro in places is to long and catches on things. I hope it fixes my problem before it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W

customer_reviews.title: He is very satisfied with the product and insisted I go back and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family member after he was diagnosed with Plantar Fasciitis and he couldn't afford the $200 one the doctor tried to sell him. He is very satisfied with the product and insisted I go back and review. It's definitely helped relieve pain and gotten him back on his feet and back to work quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Spike ball NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Spike ball was NOT included as stated in the description. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality did the job my only complaint that it should be a left and a right
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Best solution for plantar fasciitis. This worked wonders. I've tried everything except shots or surgery and this did the job amazingly. I highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: DebSerrano

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable if wearing more than 30 minutes ... but effective

customer_reviews.title: My heel does feel better when stretched
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable for sleeping. I where it before bed. My heel does feel better when stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Horrible Delivery
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it should so I am very pleased. BUT the box it came in was destroyed and open. I think I might be missing a few pieces!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Noticed relief within a week. Very good product and great price.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The straps are not perfect but at this price and performance level, it is a great value.

customer_reviews.title: Clunky and didn't come with every thing pictured
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with every thing pictured. The brace helps my plantar but hurts the rest of my foot. Clunky so have to take it off when I have to get up at night
customer_reviews.author: trev wagner

customer_reviews.title: Both my feet have it but my left one is worse so I use it on that one
customer_reviews.text: One night! One night! And already I feel the difference in my foot. Both my feet have it but my left one is worse so I use it on that one. I already feel the difference. Now I am going to buy one for my right foot!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can help
customer_reviews.text: It can be hard to sleep in but my foot feels better in the morning when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: carol laucella

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The product is helping. The only issue is I wish it would pull my foot a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Kight

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Item works great. Good support. Used it instead of the walking boot. Walking boot is really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Arrived timely and is much more supportive than my previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely and is much more supportive than my previous splint. And I can't get out of it in my sleep!! Which helps because now my foot stays in the splint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first product that actually works to relieve pain.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this ailment! I have tried other night splints, insoles, anti-iflammatories, socks etc etc. This is the first product that has truly made a difference. It is a bit big and may take some getting used to sleeping with it, HOWEVER, it has significantly reduced the pain in the morning and for the first time in many months I actually take normal steps throughout the day. It is different than other night splints because it REALLY stretches the tendon. You have to adjust the straps on the side that pull the foot towards the shin, but it truly helps!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Devine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly how expected and works excellent for my plantar fasciitis pain .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish the straps were reversible ......pain in the neck to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: William Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the splint sold to me by my doc
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the splint sold to me by my doc. So comfy, and it helps so much with my plantar faschiitis and tarsal tunnel syndrome
customer_reviews.author: casassy62688

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it has the only thing is the Velcro strips tear and I have to sew them back down
customer_reviews.author: Shamanda

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, easy to use, made of good quality material. Only two points to remark: The side streps to regulate the angle should allow smaller angles and the rubber to elevate the front of the feet should be bigger or come with more than one size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vive Hard Plantar Fasciitis Night Splint and Trigger Point Spike - Stabilizer Brace Relieves Inflammation - Foot Support Boot Features Adjustable Hook and Loop Straps for Achilles Pain Relief
feature_bullets: ALLEVIATE FOOT PAIN AND INFLAMMATION: Maintaining a neutral foot position that gently stretches the plantar fascia, the Vive hard night splint reduces pain and inflammation due to plantar fasciitis, drop foot and Achilles tendonitis. Gently stretching the foot, the splint is worn throughout the night to alleviate painful first steps in the morning. The rigid exterior supports the calf, ankle and foot so you can rest comfortably.

DURABLE EXTERIOR WITH A SOFT INTERIOR: Durably constructed with a hard composite material, the exterior splint provides exceptional support that can withstand extensive use. The interior of the hard night splint is comfortably padded with a breathable foam with a soft lining. The soft lining prevents skin irritation, blisters and abrasions.

VERSATILE DESIGN: Secured with three wide adjustable straps, the latex-free night splint fits both men and women. The straps are made with a strong webbing and fastener material. Each strap also has a buckle, eliminating the need to adjust the straps every night. Versatilely designed, the splint can be worn on the left or right foot.

TWO WAYS TO OPTIMIZE THE STRETCH: Customize the amount of stretch for optimal pain relief with the use of two comfortably padded stretch wedges and dual tension straps.The tension straps can be adjusted to increase angle of the foot. Made with a soft foam, the wedges elevate the foot to ensure proper positioning for maximum relief. Use each wedge separately or combined to achieve the perfect amount of stretch.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day unconditional guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
